sentence.Network_en: His brows tightly knit , the old man gazed speechlessly towards the west.
sentence.Network_cn: 老沙头一言不发,皱着眉头站在窗前,向西凝望着.

sentence.Network_en: He stood up soundlessly and speechlessly and glided across the hallway and through a door.
sentence.Network_cn: 他悄悄地站起来,一言不发,目光扫过走廊和大门.

list.abs: The man nodded speechlessly ., 那人默默地点点头.

sentences.sentence: "he stood up soundlessly and speechlessly and glided across the hallway and through a door"

auth_sentence.content: One stray coil meant "a speechlessly quick chaotic bundling of a man into eternity," as Melville put it.
